-- Megatron --

Megatron dodges to the side, his feet sliding along the ground 
bringing him to a halt. The energy blast leaves a chared spot on the 
ground where he was standing moments earlier.

"The only one will be me, infidels have to place in posistions of 
command."

The Predacon leader raises his left hand, and twists it slightly, 
drawing his energon bladed axe out of subspace. It's black edge 
flickers, then flares into smoke-like energon wisps as the entire 
edge become surrounded with a mesmerizing purple glow. His right 
arm's dragon head curls up a bit, as if indicating for Galvatron to 
come to him. Then he also spreads his wings, and leaps into flight, 
ready for whatever onslaught the other bot would bring on.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron roard and transformed into robot mode. His flame sword 
in his 
> right hand he took a fighting stance. "There can be only one!" His 
wings 
> spread and he shot into the air his left hand blasting a lazer shot 
at 
> Megatron.
